name: ng-injector
description: Injector decorator for writing angular 1.x with ES6/TypeScript

scripts.build_cjs: rm -rf lib/cjs && tsc src/index.ts tools/typings/tsd.d.ts -m commonjs --outDir lib/cjs --sourcemap --sourceRoot src --target ES5 -d --diagnostics --pretty --experimentalDecorators --suppressImplicitAnyIndexErrors
scripts.build_es6: rm -rf lib/es2015 && tsc src/index.ts tools/typings/tsd.d.ts --outDir lib/es2015 --sourcemap --sourceRoot src --target ES2015 -d --diagnostics --pretty --experimentalDecorators --suppressImplicitAnyIndexErrors
scripts.build_test: rm -rf www && ts-node tools/build/build_test.ts && cp test/index.html www
scripts.build_all: npm run build_cjs && npm run build_es6 && npm run build_umd && npm run build_test

author: lynweklm@gmail.com
